name: ChocoCrunch Hazelnut Bar
description: ChocoCrunch Hazelnut Bar is a delightful treat for chocolate lovers. Packed with crunchy hazelnuts and smooth chocolate, it’s perfect for a quick snack or a satisfying dessert. Indulge in this rich, sweet snack on the go!

name: CitrusBurst Fresh Orange Juice
description: CitrusBurst Fresh Orange Juice is made from 100% pure oranges. With a refreshing, tangy flavor, it's the perfect drink to start your day. Rich in vitamin C and natural goodness, it provides a fresh burst of energy with every sip.

name: SavoryBites Classic Potato Chips
description: SavoryBites Classic Potato Chips are the perfect snack for any occasion. With a crispy crunch and a lightly salted flavor, these chips are irresistible and delicious. Whether you’re watching TV, hosting a party, or on the go, they’re sure to satisfy your cravings.
